summary: One kind of Japanese Spear, General Sanada Yukimura use this kind of weapon
descriptionHtml:
Hello guys, haven'e seen u guys for a long time!
This time, i bring no katana, but this weapon is no bad than those katanas!
However, what troubled us is that there are no spears in Skyrim.... How strange
Thus we have no choice... so ,it is battleaxe, in some ways
{Requirement}
No special requiement
[installation & Uinstalltion]
Use NMM to do that
[How to get]
U can craft it in ur forge, 2 steel ingots is needed.
this time u need no perk and the stats is normal

At last, thank all u guys support our mods, i show my appreciate to all of u. It's ur support that give us strength to continue...
author: China-YYK and Komoe Ho
